Content from @form_ui_rules.md:

UI Rules & Design System This document outlines the user interface standards, component patterns, and styling rules based on the Tracking_chi_phi_hcp module. These rules should be applied to future UI generation to maintain consistency. 1. Technology Stack Core Framework: React (Hooks: useState, useEffect, useContext). UI Library: react-bootstrap (Bootstrap 5). Routing: react-router-dom. Icons: Native Emojis (e.g., üîç, üìñ, üì§) are preferred over icon libraries for simple actions. State Management: Context API (FeedbackContext) for global feedback (alerts, loading). Component Hover Effect: The component should have hover effect. 2. Layout & Grid System 2.1 Page Container: Must use with the class bg-teal-100 h-100. This provides the signature full-height teal background. Content Centering: Content is restricted to a central column for a "mobile-first" or "form-focused" aesthetic. Use . Use as the main wrapper for the application content. Behavior: This ensures full-width display on mobile devices (xs) while restricting width to 6 columns on tablets/desktops (md). 2.2. Navigation (Pills) Component:
Styling: Container: bg-light p-2 rounded gap-2 fw-bold. Active Item: bg-merap-active (Custom class), Text color defaults to white/light. Inactive Item: bg-white shadow-sm border + optional text color (e.g., text-success, text-info). 3. Component Styling Patterns 3.1. Cards / Content Blocks Instead of the Bootstrap component, use
with standard utility classes to create card-like surfaces: Standard Class: bg-white border rounded shadow-sm p-3 Usage: Wrap forms, lists, tables, and button groups in these blocks. Spacing: Use mt-2 or mt-3 to separate blocks. 3.3. Search & Filtering Input Style: Standard Form.Control. Placeholder: Must include a search icon emoji and instruction (e.g., üîç T√¨m m√£ ho·∫∑c t√™n (KH√îNG D·∫§U)). Logic: Filter arrays using toLowerCase() and includes(). 3.4. Scrollable List For select multiple or single item Container: with inline styles for scrollability: style={{ maxHeight: "350px", overflowY: "auto" }}. Items: . Selection Mechanism: Use inside the list item. 3.5 Form Controls & Inputs Text & Numeric Inputs Component: wrapping a . Styling: Wrapper: className="border rounded mt-2". Input: Standard Bootstrap styles. Validation Feedback: Display error messages immediately below the input using

. Grouping: Use to wrap the input and its error message together. 3.6 Select Menus (react-select) Styling: Height: Archieve a large, touch-friendly height (~58-60px) without hardcoded inline styles. Font Size: style={{ fontSize: "15px" }}. Placeholder text color is forced to Dark Gray (`#212529`) instead of default light gray. Validation:Marked as `required`. Searchable:Default Yes (`isSearchable` prop is actively set). ---
## 1. General Layout & Navigation
- **Page Container**: Use `<Container fluid>` with `className="bg-teal-100 h-100"`.
- **Content Centering**: Wrap content in `<Row className="justify-content-center">` and `<Col xs={12}>`.
- **Navigation**: Implement using `<Nav variant="pills" fill>` for the tabs.
  - Container Class: `bg-light p-2 rounded gap-2 fw-bold`
  - Active Tab Class: `bg-merap-active`
  - Inactive Tab Class: `bg-white shadow-sm border`
- **Tabs**: "ƒê·ªÅ xu·∫•t", "CXM Duy·ªát", "B√°o c√°o"

---
## 2. Tab 1: ƒê·ªÅ xu·∫•t
- **Container**: Wrap the form content in a `<div className="bg-white border rounded shadow-sm p-3 mt-2">`.

### Components:

1.  **Ch·ªçn nhi·ªÅu danh s√°ch khoa ph√≤ng (Select-Multi)**
    -   **Pattern**: Use "Scrollable List For select" (rule 3.4).

        -   Search Input: `<Form.Control placeholder="üîç T√¨m khoa ph√≤ng (KH√îNG D·∫§U)">` (rule 3.3).
        -   List Container: `<ListGroup style={{ maxHeight: "350px", overflowY: "auto" }}>`.
        -   List Item: `<ListGroup.Item className="p-1 bg-white border rounded">` containing a `<Form.Check type="switch">`.
    -   **Data**: Fetch from API (list of `id` and `ten_khoa_phong`).

2.  **Ch·ªçn nhi·ªÅu HCP (Searchable Scroll List)**

        -   List Container: `<ListGroup style={{ maxHeight: "350px", overflowY: "auto" }}>`.
        -   List Item: `<ListGroup.Item className="p-1 bg-white border rounded">` with `<Form.Check type="switch">`.
    -   **Data**: Fetch from API (list of `id` (ma_kh_chung) and `ten_gop_hco`).

3.  **SMN th√°ng (Select-Single)**

6.  **S·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng BS/ DS (Input-Number)**
    -   **Pattern**: Use "Form Controls & Inputs" (rule 3.5).
